examples: They've been best mates since school.

meanings.def: used as a friendly way of addressing somebody, especially between men
examples: Sorry mate, you'll have to wait.

meanings.def: a person you share an activity or accommodation with
the sexual partner of a bird or animal
examples: A male bird sings to attract a mate.

meanings.def: a husband, wife or other sexual partner
examples: Many matchmaking sites compile lists of potential mates using basic information.

meanings.def: a person whose job is to help a worker who has had training in a skill
an officer in a commercial ship below the rank of captain or master
a position in which one player cannot prevent their king (= the most important piece) being captured and therefore loses the game
a situation in which somebody has been completely defeated
